entry.title: Segmenting genome graphs
entry.content:
What is genome segmentation

Michael M Hoffman et al., “Unsupervised Pattern Discovery in Human Chromatin Structure through Genomic Segmentation,” Nature Methods 9, no. 5 (May 2012): 473–76, https://doi.org/10.1038/nmeth.1937.

  1. Hoffman, Michael M, Orion J Buske, Jie Wang, Zhiping Weng, Jeff A Bilmes, and William Stafford Noble. “Unsupervised Pattern Discovery in Human Chromatin Structure through Genomic Segmentation.” Nature Methods 9, no. 5 (May 2012): 473–76. https://doi.org/10.1038/nmeth.1937.
